description: Designed after ginkgo leaves, these gauntlets are sturdy and unadorned. Made from durable material, they offer exceptional protection while dealing significant damage, making them a formidable weapon that excels in defense and offense.
ranks: Energy Regen is increased by 12.8%. When Resonance Skill hits a target, Basic Attack Damage is increased by 10% lasting for 8s. when Basic Attack hits a target, Resonance Skill Damage is increased by 10% lasting for 8s.
